content.rendered:
We create solutions for

Awesome WordPress Websites

Complete web design and web development services that grow your business

Discover Our Themes
Explore our services

All-in-one solutions

Whatever you plan for a minimal website designed for your business or a heavy loaded magazine, our WordPress themes make it simple to accomplish your goals. Take your bussines online today!

Easy to Customize

Creating a professional online presence is now effortless. We build flexible solutions that are naturally easy to use. Drag and drop, combine, rearrange and shape everything to perfection in a fraction of the usual time!

ON-demand software

Your unique project, with special features, is in your grasp. Start a conversation with us and we'll make it real for you. Our experienced developers and designers are ready to assist you. Get in touch & let's get started!

Your project & success, one professional team

Choose a partner with capabilities you can trust! We've been building custom mobile and desktop development solutions that generate results for more than 6 years.

No bulk packs for your unique project. We analyze your project and determine the most efficient way to reach your goals. Pay only the Web Development and Design Services you actually get.

See all services

Digital Support Services

  • Code Audits
  • Code Refactoring
  • Comprehensive Digital Maintenance
  • Web Core Vitals Optimization
  • Performance Optimization
  • Database Optimization

WordPress Development

  • Software as a Service
  • Multisite Development
  • Building Custom Plugins
  • Content Management Systems
  • Custom Web Development Services
  • eCommerce on WordPress

Web Solution Development

  • JavaScript Development
  • Open-Source Web Development
  • Web Solutions
  • Web Design Integration
  • WordPress Enterprise Integration
  • Full-service Development

Design and Front-end Development

  • Crafting Unique Designs
  • Building Custom WordPress Themes
  • Architecting Theme Frameworks
  • Corporate Identity Design
  • Responsive Wireframing
  • Visual Design

Discover the Art of Publishing

Themes for Smart People

We've made web design easy for you! Unlimited designs, powerful options, modern & customizable framework, and outstanding support are waiting for you. Over 118,000 Beginners and Professionals love our themes. You should try one, too!

Newspaper Theme

News & Multipurpose

Building your business website, blog, news, magazine, hobby, shop or any other website has never been easier. Newspaper is the best WordPress Theme that helps you create and design your project without any coding skills. Over 111,000+ happy customers are using it today. All the features you need for an awesome site are already packed in a single news theme WordPress. Experience the power of design with Newspaper!

More Details
LIVE PREVIEW

Newsmag Theme

News & Magazine

Are you searching for a modern blog, news, and magazine WordPress theme? The Newsmag template is excellent for a news, newspaper, magazine, publishing or review site. SEO ready, fast, simple, and easy to use without coding skills, Newsmag WordPress Theme is designed to help you monetize your website. Try it now!

More Details
LIVE PREVIEW

Our work & design style

You are in good company!

Over 118,000 people, beginners and professionals, from around the world have already created successful projects with the Newspaper Theme and Newsmag Theme. Join us!

Newspaper is a complete out-of-the-box WordPress theme, and also gives you the ability to fine-tune your website if you need it.

Elena Chepikova

Project Manager at HandMade39

We are very happy with the support and the many updates and development offered by tagDiv web development company!

Chabot Philippe

Senior IT Manager, unric.org

I've had a great experience with the theme. It has made my passion as a travel blogger come true with ease. Thanks!

Alex Maltsev

Editor-in-Chief at Magazeta

Browse an amazing collection of websites built by our customers!

Newspaper Showcase
Newsmag Showcase

How can we help transform your next big idea?

Our creative team would love to hear from you. Contact us and let's build something great together!

Let's talk
